column3: Ranked value of how fertile the soil of this land cover type is (1=least fertile).
column4: Scale of 1-5, how fertile is the soil of this land cover type?

column7: Ranked value of how useful this land cover type is for providing firewood (1= least firewood)

column10: Scale of 1-5, land cover conversion cost. How much effort is required to convert this land cover type to agricultural land?
